user.title: Google Home Exposure Manager
user.description: This integration helps you manage which entities are exposed to Google Assistant.

credentials.title: Service Account Setup
credentials.description:
A Google Service Account is required. You can either:

1. Paste your service account JSON below
2. Manually place `SERVICE_ACCOUNT.json` in your config folder

See the [setup guide]({setup_guide_url}) for instructions.

After restarting, come back to configure which entities to expose.

confirm.title: Restart Home Assistant

Google Home Exposure Manager has been updated or reloaded. A restart is recommended to ensure all changes take effect properly.

Go to **Settings → System → Restart** to restart Home Assistant.
